process.description: TCP4-2414 Verify Web Entry with timers
process.name: TCP4-2414 Verify Web Entry with timers
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="453" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":454,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_4</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="Frist Screen" pm:screenRef="456" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="453" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}},"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_4</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_4" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_14" name="Completed Form" pm:screenRef="457" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="453" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}},"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:boundaryEvent id="node_17" name="Boundary Timer Event" attachedToRef="node_14">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT5M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:boundaryEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="" sourceRef="node_17" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_20" name="Print Result" pm:screenRef="458" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="453" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}},"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_25</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_20"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_23" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="455">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_25</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_25" name="" sourceRef="node_20" targetRef="node_23"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_14"/>
  </bpmn:process>

config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type

config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.name: Data Format
config.label: Data Format
config.helper: The data format for the selected type.

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true
